name: Pyre Hop
description:
As the campers reach the end of their night around the fire pit, they want the fire gone and out. But why when the night is still so young? As a flame you must keep those shadows dancing - resist and let the light persist! Grow your fire to win back the campers love... but be sure to balance growth with defense of the campfire!

A mobile game made by Mary Benetti and Joshua Teeters at UW-Stout, during Fall 2018
